import { FormControl, Container, TextField, Button } from "@material-ui/core" import useStyles from './Signup.style' import { signup } from '../../actions/userActions' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { useState } from "react" const Signup = () =>{ const classes = useStyles() const dispatch = useDispatch() const [firstName, setFirstName] = useState() const [lastName, setLastName] = useState() const [phoneNumber, setPhoneNumber ] = useState() const [email, setEmail] = useState() const [password, setPassword] = useState() const userToken = useSelector((state) => state) console.log(userToken.useReducer()) const user = { firstName, lastName, phoneNumber, email, password } const handleSubmit = async (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() dispatch(signup(user)) } return(
{JSON.stringify({user})}
{/* */} setFirstName(e.target.value)} /> setLastName(e.target.value)} /> setPhoneNumber(e.target.value)} /> setEmail(e.target.value)} /> setPassword(e.target.value)} /> {/* */}
) } export default Signup
